statusLine.command: input=$(cat); printf "\033[2m"; if [[ -d .git ]]; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=''; [[ -n $(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null) ]] && status='*'; printf "\033[34m%s\033[22m \033[37m%s%s\033[22m" "$(basename "$(pwd)")" "$branch" "$status"; else printf "\033[34m%s\033[22m" "$(basename "$(pwd)")"; fi; printf "\033[0m"
